Name: Starter Kit
Description: Entry point for Safe smart account interaction with simplified workflows

Name: Protocol Kit
Description: Core interaction layer for account creation and transaction execution

Name: API Kit
Description: Integration with Transaction Service API for multi-sig coordination

Name: Relay Kit
Description: Transaction relaying and gas abstraction with ERC-4337

Name: React Hooks
Description: Frontend integration layer for React applications

Name: Safe Singleton
Description: Main implementation contract with execution logic

Name: Safe Proxy
Description: Lightweight proxy delegating to Singleton

Name: Safe Proxy Factory
Description: Deploys Safe Proxy contracts with setup

Name: Safe Singleton Factory
Description: Cross-chain deployment standardization

Name: OwnerManager
Description: Manages Safe owners and threshold configuration

Name: Guard System
Description: Transaction-level policy enforcement

Name: Module System
Description: Pluggable contract system for extensibility

Name: Allowance Module
Description: Delegates limited execution permissions

Name: Recovery Module
Description: Enables account recovery mechanisms

Name: 4337 Module
Description: ERC-4337 Account Abstraction integration

Name: Passkey Module
Description: Passkey-based authentication support

Name: Transaction Service
Description: Multi-chain transaction tracking via event indexing

Name: Events Service
Description: Event indexing with HTTP webhook delivery

Name: Config Service
Description: Network configuration and chain variables registry

Name: Client Gateway
Description: Facade aggregating Transaction and Config Services

Name: Decoder Service
Description: Transaction data decoding capabilities
